turns.question: Which drugs has patient 006-71495 been prescribed two or more times in the past 46 months?
turns.query: select t1.drugname from ( select medication.drugname, count( medication.drugstarttime ) as c1 from medication where medication.patientunitstayid in ( select patient.patientunitstayid from patient where patient.patienthealthsystemstayid in ( select patient.patienthealthsystemstayid from patient where patient.uniquepid = '006-71495' ) ) and datetime(medication.drugstarttime) >= datetime('2102-01-15 23:00:00','-46 month') group by medication.drugname ) as t1 where t1.c1 >= 2

turns.question: Is potassium chloride still the only drug prescribed at least twice?
turns.query: select t1.drugname from ( select medication.drugname, count( medication.drugstarttime ) as c1 from medication where medication.patientunitstayid in ( select patient.patientunitstayid from patient where patient.patienthealthsystemstayid in ( select patient.patienthealthsystemstayid from patient where patient.uniquepid = '006-71495' ) ) and datetime(medication.drugstarttime) >= datetime('2102-01-15 23:17:00','-46 month') group by medication.drugname ) as t1 where t1.c1 >= 2

q_tag: what was the name of the drug that patient {patient_id} were prescribed [n_times] [time_filter_global1]?

turns.question: What is the difference in systemicmean between the most recent and the second-most-recent measurements during the current ICU stay for patient 017-88691?

turns.question: Which medication(s) was patient 030-30152 prescribed two or more times during the past 143 months?
turns.query: select t1.drugname from ( select medication.drugname, count( medication.drugstarttime ) as c1 from medication where medication.patientunitstayid in ( select patient.patientunitstayid from patient where patient.patienthealthsystemstayid in ( select patient.patienthealthsystemstayid from patient where patient.uniquepid = '030-30152' ) ) and datetime(medication.drugstarttime) >= datetime('2105-07-17 20:16:00','-143 month') group by medication.drugname ) as t1 where t1.c1 >= 2

1000 ml flex cont : sodium chloride 0.9 % iv soln
turns.answer: 1 ml crtrdg-ndl : lorazepam 2 mg/ml ij soln; 1000 ml  -  sodium chloride 0.9 % iv soln; 1000 ml flex cont : sodium chloride 0.9 % iv soln; fentanyl citrate (pf) 50 mcg/ml inj soln; midazolam; potassium chloride; sodium chloride 0.9 % iv solp; tylenol

turns.question: Which additional medications meet the twice-prescribed criterion?

turns.query: select lab.labname from lab where lab.patientunitstayid in ( select patient.patientunitstayid from patient where patient.patienthealthsystemstayid in ( select patient.patienthealthsystemstayid from patient where patient.uniquepid = '010-17316' ) ) and datetime(lab.labresulttime) >= datetime('2105-09-14 09:22:00','-9 month') order by lab.labresulttime DESC limit 1

q_tag: what was the name of the lab test that patient {patient_id} [time_filter_exact1] received [time_filter_global1]?

turns.question: Has patient 006-40255 received any medications that were started within the last 5 years?
turns.query: select count(*)>0 from medication where medication.patientunitstayid in ( select patient.patientunitstayid from patient where patient.patienthealthsystemstayid in ( select patient.patienthealthsystemstayid from patient where patient.uniquepid = '006-40255' ) ) and datetime(medication.drugstarttime) >= datetime('2103-08-30 21:27:00','-5 year')

turns.question: Were any new medications initiated?
turns.query: select count(*)>0 from medication where medication.patientunitstayid in ( select patient.patientunitstayid from patient where patient.patienthealthsystemstayid in ( select patient.patienthealthsystemstayid from patient where patient.uniquepid = '006-40255' ) ) and datetime(medication.drugstarttime) >= datetime('2103-08-30 21:45:00','-5 year') and datetime(medication.drugstarttime) > datetime('2103-08-30 21:27:00')

q_tag: has_verb patient {patient_id} been prescribed any medication [time_filter_global1]?

turns.question: During the current ICU stay for patient 004-34650, has sao2 ever been greater than 95.0?
turns.query: select count(*)>0 from vitalperiodic where vitalperiodic.patientunitstayid in ( select patient.patientunitstayid from patient where patient.patienthealthsystemstayid in ( select patient.patienthealthsystemstayid from patient where patient.uniquepid = '004-34650' ) and patient.unitdischargetime is null ) and vitalperiodic.sao2 > 95.0 and vitalperiodic.sao2 is not null

turns.question: Has sao2 exceeded 95.0 again?
turns.query: select count(*)>0 from vitalperiodic where vitalperiodic.patientunitstayid in ( select patient.patientunitstayid from patient where patient.patienthealthsystemstayid in ( select patient.patienthealthsystemstayid from patient where patient.uniquepid = '004-34650' ) and patient.unitdischargetime is null ) and vitalperiodic.sao2 is not null and vitalperiodic.sao2 > 95.0 and vitalperiodic.observationtime > '2104-05-11 19:18:00'

q_tag: has_verb the {vital_name} of patient {patient_id} been ever [comparison] than {vital_value} [time_filter_global1]?

turns.question: During the current hospital admission for 022-187132, is the most recent pt - inr lower than the first pt - inr measured on this admission?
turns.query: select ( select lab.labresult from lab where lab.patientunitstayid in ( select patient.patientunitstayid from patient where patient.patienthealthsystemstayid in ( select patient.patienthealthsystemstayid from patient where patient.uniquepid = '022-187132' and patient.hospitaldischargetime is null ) ) and lab.labname = 'pt - inr' order by lab.labresulttime desc limit 1 ) < ( select lab.labresult from lab where lab.patientunitstayid in ( select patient.patientunitstayid from patient where patient.patienthealthsystemstayid in ( select patient.patienthealthsystemstayid from patient where patient.uniquepid = '022-187132' and patient.hospitaldischargetime is null ) ) and lab.labname = 'pt - inr' order by lab.labresulttime ASC limit 1 )

turns.question: Is the current pt - inr at or above the first value?
turns.query: select ( select lab.labresult from lab where lab.patientunitstayid in ( select patient.patientunitstayid from patient where patient.patienthealthsystemstayid in ( select patient.patienthealthsystemstayid from patient where patient.uniquepid = '022-187132' and patient.hospitaldischargetime is null ) ) and lab.labname = 'pt - inr' order by lab.labresulttime desc limit 1 ) < ( select lab.labresult from lab where lab.patientunitstayid in ( select patient.patientunitstayid from patient where patient.patienthealthsystemstayid in ( select patient.patienthealthsystemstayid from patient where patient.uniquepid = '022-187132' and patient.hospitaldischargetime is null ) ) and lab.labname = 'pt - inr' order by lab.labresulttime ASC limit 1 )

q_tag: is the value of {lab_name} of patient {patient_id} [time_filter_exact2] measured [time_filter_global2] [comparison] than the [time_filter_exact1] value measured [time_filter_global1]?

turns.question: What was the most recent intake recorded during this hospital admission for patient 022-166510?
turns.query: select intakeoutput.celllabel from intakeoutput where intakeoutput.patientunitstayid in ( select patient.patientunitstayid from patient where patient.patienthealthsystemstayid in ( select patient.patienthealthsystemstayid from patient where patient.uniquepid = '022-166510' ) ) and intakeoutput.cellpath like '%intake%' order by intakeoutput.intakeoutputtime DESC limit 1

turns.question: Has the most recent intake changed?
turns.query: select intakeoutput.celllabel from intakeoutput where intakeoutput.patientunitstayid in ( select patient.patientunitstayid from patient where patient.patienthealthsystemstayid in ( select patient.patienthealthsystemstayid from patient where patient.uniquepid = '022-166510' ) ) and intakeoutput.cellpath like '%intake%' order by intakeoutput.intakeoutputtime DESC limit 1

q_tag: what was the name of the intake that patient {patient_id} [time_filter_exact1] had [time_filter_global1]?
